hero.description: Revolutionizing tax and accounting with LLM & RAG technology. We provide accurate references and answers to complex regulations, powerfully supporting the work of tax professionals and accountants.

demo_card.user_question: What are the R&D tax credit application requirements under the 2024 amended Special Tax Treatment Act?
demo_card.ai_response: According to the revised Article 10 of the Special Tax Treatment Control Act, the scope of recognized costs for new growth and source technologies has been expanded...

services.description: Save the hassle of searching through thousands of pages. AI instantly finds the relevant statutes and precedents to accelerate expert work.
services.card1_desc: Understands the context of tax law, not just keywords. Accurately matches related statutes and regulations even for ambiguous queries.
services.card2_desc: Automatically drafts client advisory documents based on searched statutes. Reduce work time by 90% with high-quality drafts.
services.card3_desc: Learns daily changing tax laws and regulations in real-time. Guaranteed to never fall behind with the latest legal information.

process.description: Ask AI before flipping through law books. It's like hiring a capable junior associate who reads and analyzes tens of thousands of pages in seconds.

accuracy.description: Transparency and interpretability are essential for integration into critical decision-making processes. TaxAI provides clear sources for all claims.
accuracy.feature1_desc: Generates answers only within the provided statute text through strict constraints.
accuracy.feature2_desc: Supports on-premise deployment options for sensitive client data.
accuracy.feature3_desc: Transparently track the logic and reasoning used to derive tax advice.

advisors.advisor1_quote: "The ability to instantly cross-verify international tax treaties and domestic law is a game changer for cross-border consulting."
advisors.advisor2_quote: "After adopting TaxAI, preliminary research time was reduced by 70%. Junior accountants can now focus on strategy instead of repetitive tasks."
advisors.advisor3_quote: "In our field, accuracy is everything. With clear citation sources for every answer, we can confidently use it for consulting."

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: Built by AI experts and tax professionals together.

cta.description: Over 500 accounting firms are already maximizing efficiency with TaxAI.
cta.plan_desc: Custom LLM Training & On-Premise Deployment Support

faq.q1: Can I use TaxAI for client projects?
faq.a1: Yes, you can. TaxAI is designed to help with drafting and research for client deliverables. However, final outputs must always be reviewed by qualified professionals.
faq.a2: We comply with SOC 2 Type II standards. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We also offer private cloud deployment options for enterprise customers.
faq.q3: Which countries and regulations are supported?
faq.a3: Currently, we support national and local taxes and court cases throughout South Korea, with US federal tax law in beta. EU VAT regulations will be added in Q4.
